onyomiExamples.meaning: Chinese "star" constellation (one of the 28 mansions), Singapore
constellation, astrological sign, star sign, zodiac sign
celestial body seen only for a short time (e.g. comet)
the Big Dipper (asterism), the Plough, the Plow

kunyomiExamples.meaning: star (usu. not including the Sun), planet (usu. not including Earth), heavenly body, star (glyph, symbol, shape), star (actor, player, etc.), small dot, spot, fleck, star point (in go), hoshi, intersection marked with a dot, perp, perpetrator, mark, offender, suspect, bullseye, one's star (that determines one's fate), one's fortune, point, score
the Big Dipper (asterism), the Plough, the Plow
ray of light, ray of hope, promising talent
